text:
="preserve">Délio dos Santos (4 October 1924 – 1 September 2020) was a Brazilian lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies between 1979 to 1987. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement.
Dos Santos died of pneumonia on 1 September 2020 in Rio de Janeiro, aged 95.
